thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Oomitsu to issue new shares via public offering and private placement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oomitsu to issue new shares via public offering and private placement
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Oomitsu Co Ltd
* Says it plans to issue 1.2 million new shares via public offering
* Says it plans to issue 225,000 new shares via private placement, with subscription date on March 22 and payment date on March 23
* Says it plans to raise 1.22 billion yen in total for equipment investment fund and working capital supplement
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/TMfz9E
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
